column5: House in quite neighborhood only 15 min from downtown. You will also be 10 min. from Katy Mills Mall and Texas Typhoon Water Park! Large back patio for relaxing in the evenings. The house has 1 king, 1 full bed as well as couch with 3 recliners. For those with new born's or infants, we also have a nursery with a crib. if needed there are also two large air mattresses.
